title: Mesto tieňov
overview: Tomáš Benkovský  arrives at the Department of Violent Crime in Bratislava. His father, a forensic pathologist, has arranged a place for him. Apart from Tomáš, his team includes Oliver, Sergej, Rudo . The psychologist Jana also works in the department. The head of the whole department is Milan. Alongside the investigation of crimes, the lives of Ivan and Tomáš are also revealed. Ivan has a problem with his daughter, and it spills over into his relationship with his wife. Tomáš, in turn, moves into an apartment with his girlfriend - journalist Lucia. Meanwhile, Tomáš has a damaged relationship with his father, whom he meets at work - he blames him for his workaholism and blames him for his mother's accident, which left her in a wheelchair.
